pages.text:
Title: The certification suite: A classification system for certification tests

Abstract: Performance ImprovementVolume 37, Issue 7 p. 13-18 Article The certification suite: A classification system for certification tests William Coscarelli, William Coscarelli coscarel@siu.edu William Coscarelli is a professor in Curriculum and Instruction at Southern Illinois University at Carbondale. He was the editor of Performance Improvement Quarterly and an ISPI past president and has consulted with a number of global corporations on criterion-referenced test development.Search for more papers by this authorDavid G. Robins, David G. Robins david_robins@hp.com David G. Robins is the global project manager for Hewlett-Packard's Education Life Cycle Methodology, having spent nine years in the Worldwide Customer Education Department as a process manager, course developer, and internal consultant.Search for more papers by this authorSharon Shrock, Sharon Shrock sashrock@siu.edu Sharon Shrock is a professor in Curriculum and Instruction at Southern Illinois University at Carbondale. She specializes in instructional design and program evaluation and has been an evaluation consultant to international corporations, school districts, and federal instructional programs.Search for more papers by this authorPatti Herbst, Patti Herbst pattijoerbst@hp.com Patti Herbst is currently the technical education program manager for Hewlett-Packard's Bay Area Regional Training Center. Patti has worked in a variety of training and development positions at Hewlett-Packard, including sales and technical course development as well as heading the HP Reseller Certification program.Search for more papers by this author William Coscarelli, William Coscarelli coscarel@siu.edu William Coscarelli is a professor in Curriculum and Instruction at Southern Illinois University at Carbondale. He was the editor of Performance Improvement Quarterly and an ISPI past president and has consulted with a number of global corporations on criterion-referenced test development.Search for more papers by this authorDavid G. Robins, David G. Robins david_robins@hp.com David G. Robins is the global project manager for Hewlett-Packard's Education Life Cycle Methodology, having spent nine years in the Worldwide Customer Education Department as a process manager, course developer, and internal consultant.Search for more papers by this authorSharon Shrock, Sharon Shrock sashrock@siu.edu Sharon Shrock is a professor in Curriculum and Instruction at Southern Illinois University at Carbondale. She specializes in instructional design and program evaluation and has been an evaluation consultant to international corporations, school districts, and federal instructional programs.Search for more papers by this authorPatti Herbst, Patti Herbst pattijoerbst@hp.com Patti Herbst is currently the technical education program manager for Hewlett-Packard's Bay Area Regional Training Center. Patti has worked in a variety of training and development positions at Hewlett-Packard, including sales and technical course development as well as heading the HP Reseller Certification program.Search for more papers by this author First published: 07 February 2007 10.1002/pfi.4140370706Citations: 1 AboutPDF ToolsRequest permissionExport citationAdd to favoritesTrack citation ShareShare Give accessShare full text accessShare full-text accessPlease review our Terms and Conditions of Use and check box below to share full-text version of article.I have read and accept the Wiley Online Library Terms and Conditions of UseShareable LinkUse the link below to share a full-text version of this article with your friends and colleagues.
